Articles.Content:
No issues with this here in 1.0... so far!

How come ? You sure ?

Here I already noticed the following:

- Applauncher button not showing

- Log spammed because of deprecated maxAtmosphereAltitude method

But I am on it

Please can you check your log just to be sure you don't have lots of red stuff (ALT-F2 in flight), thanks.

How come ? You sure ?

Here I already noticed the following:

- Applauncher button not showing

- Log spammed because of deprecated maxAtmosphereAltitude method

But I am on it

Please can you check your log just to be sure you don't have lots of red stuff (ALT-F2 in flight), thanks.

Interesting, I am getting a lot of red entries in the log, but the chatterer sounds still seem to function for me. I have no button to open menu to change settings, but it still seems to willpower through and work thus far, have no tested a probe yet. This is my only mod currently in 1.0 as I wanted to try it first.

Ok so we are getting the same behavior, thanks for the report

here is a devbuild with log spam issue fixed if anyone want to try it : new link 2 post below

Will try to fix the UI asap.

Edited April 28, 2015 by Athlonic

Ok so we are getting the same behavior, thanks for the report

here is a devbuild with log spam issue fixed if anyone want to try it : https://www.dropbox.com/s/r2kq36xs8p6pewp/Chatterer.dll?dl=0

Will try to fix the UI asap.

Haha, I waited until 1.0 to play my most anticipated mod after never touching any mods ever all the way back to alpha, so of course I don't get lucky and have it work the first go! XD

The latest version of chatterer isn't working for me, so I threw your DLL into my folder as a replacement for the one already there. I still get the red atmosphere message spam, though.

edit: It randomly started working after I reinstalled, so I must've screwed it up haha. Still no ui button though. And it's soooo gooood!

Edited April 27, 2015 by Captain Burrito

Second devbuild version here :

https://www.dropbox.com/s/r2kq36xs8p6pewp/Chatterer.dll?dl=0

UI should be fixed.

Let me now if everything works fine, if it is a go I will upload it officially tomorrow when I wake up ^^
I forget how dead quiet the game is when this isn't installed. Looking forward to the update
Thanks Athlonic!

Second devbuild version here :

Appears to be working well Athlonic. Also just wanted to mention that Chatterer was the first mod I tried to install on top of stock. It's incredibly difficult to play without it once you're used to it
So glad it still works, its hard to go to space without you buddy.

You are welcome guys

Here you go :

Changelog:

v0.9.0 [28 Apr 2015]

- Recompiled and added compatibility for KSP 1.0 :

* fix for deprecated (maxAtmosphereAltitude) method

* fix for new applicationLauncherButton management

- Set Insta-keys at "none" by default

- Added a button to clear Insta-keys binding

I also put a new item on my todo list :

- Feminize voice when female Kerbal is speaking
Thanks. +10chr
So 1.0 update! Thank you!
Female voices is kinda necessary right now.

I also put a new item on my todo list :

- Feminize voice when female Kerbal is speaking

There are some female voices among the Space Shuttle soundbite archives at NASA. I'm sure you knew that already, but thought it was worth mentioning.
Yay! No more "dead" space in 1.0. Thanks!

I forget how dead quiet the game is when this isn't installed. Looking forward to the update

Exactly!

Playing last night without this just felt wrong

Thanks for your hard work Athlonic
Thank you very much Athlonic I missed it a lot.
Thanks so much, the silence was driving me mad!

edit: nevermind, problem solved

Edited April 28, 2015 by Capt. Hunt
Thank god.... I really missed this.

Thank you so much for your quick update! as others have said..game is not the same without it!

Peace

Whoops. I just completed one 12 minute mission in 1.0 with this mod installed and I can't believe I played through a whole career in 0.90 without it. What a mistake that was!

Literally every KSP player needs to install this mod, immediately.
Thanks a lot. The silance was maddening (-:
1.0 game not working.

You sure ?

Tested in 1.0 / 1.0.1 / 1.0.2 and didn't see any issues here, what sort of issue do you have ?
